channel.title: Will you stay?
channel.description:
After the mod is released, will you stay on the forums or not?
And why?

item.title: Will you stay?
item.dc:creator: danielsangeo
item.description:
Ryλn:

Here’s a good analogy for this event:

You become aroused(discovering black mesa), You want sexy time(consistently checking black mesa), MOAR(impatiently complaing about media), Deploying Intercourse in 3… 2… 1…(Black mesa is released), You are releived of immense sexual tension and leave behind a complete cum-fuck mess(played black mesa and can now relax).

Then you wake up the next day and find sores around the corners of your master boot record and in your subdirectories, then your virus scanner pops up and…

…wait.

Read full topic

item.title: Will you stay?
item.dc:creator: Ry_amp_955_n
item.description:
The only reason i’m so attracted to this forum is bc 1, obviously black mesa and checking what’s new on the mod and the community about mod progress and other new games coming out this year, and 2, it’s a fuckin lawless troll fest and i love it.
With the mod out, like many people have said before, that attraction of constantly checking this place out and perusing the forums for news will die down very quickly once Black Mesa is played, conquered, and loved by all it’s fans. Here’s a good analogy for this event:

You become aroused(discovering black mesa), You want sexy time(consistently checking black mesa), MOAR(impatiently complaing about media), Deploying Intercourse in 3… 2… 1…(Black mesa is released), You are releived of immense sexual tension and leave behind a complete cum-fuck mess(played black mesa and can now relax).

New people will join and annoy the devs with their disatisfactions on the mod.
People will post screenshots of their crazy adventures and hilarious moments that they experienced while playing the mod.
And possibly, trolling could reach up to a dangerously high new level.

Read full topic

item.title: Will you stay?
item.dc:creator: Someonerandm
item.description:
jambo:

I’ve already been here for 5-6 years, what’s another 5-6?

The rest of your slow decent into internet depravity?

Read full topic

item.title: Will you stay?
item.dc:creator: Surplus
item.description:
I don’t think the mod releasing has anything to do with me staying or not. I’ll leave if I start to dislike it here or find somewhere I like better. So far neither have happened. Its a shit hole no matter where you go on the internet, at least this place is a funny shit hole.

Read full topic

item.title: Will you stay?
item.dc:creator: Frozen_Cham
item.description:
Mango Assassin:

I think every forum user has been banned at least once, Albeit unfairly or not.

What’s even more annoying is not being able to stop people you hate from playing your creation.

the statement is false.
But I don’t really want it either.

Read full topic

item.title: Will you stay?
item.dc:creator: Dr_Strangelove
item.description:
I’d have to say I’ve avoided spoilers pretty well.

As far as I know half-life is a game about completing different science-related objectives for scientists throughout the facility until you level up enough to become the head scientist and die happily knowing you spent your entire life devoted to meaningless tasks.

Read full topic
